text: Richard Goodwin (born 8 March 1987) is an Australian-Filipino cricketer who plays for the Philippines cricket team. Goodwin also represents Cromer Cricket Club in the Manly Warringah Cricket association, where he captains the First Grade side. In March 2019, he was named in the Philippines squad for the Regional Finals of the 2018–19 ICC T20 World Cup East Asia-Pacific Qualifier tournament. He made his Twenty20 International (T20I) debut for the Philippines against Papua New Guinea on 22 March 2019. In addition to cricket, Goodwin also represents the Philippines national rugby league team, and has previously represented the Philippines in rugby sevens. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Filipino cricketers Category:Philippines Twenty20 International cricketers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Richard Goodwin (cricketer)
